thread.title: George Clooney is going to be a dad, wife Amal is pregnant with twins!
thread.title_full: George Clooney is going to be a dad, wife Amal is pregnant with twins!

author: moumita bhattacharjee
title: George Clooney is going to be a dad, wife Amal is pregnant with twins!
text:
George Clooney is going to be… George Clooney is going to be a dad, wife Amal is pregnant with twins! George Clooney will be welcoming twins this June. Congratulations is of the order. By moumita bhattacharjee | Updated:  27 am George Clooney and Amal Clooney divorce: Here’s taking a look at what went wrong in their paradise 
George Clooney lost his much coveted and celebrated bachelorhood to Amal in a lavish ceremony. Everyone was elated that the dashing man has finally decided to settle down. And now we hear they are going to be parents soon. Yes, Amal is pregnant with twins. Julie Chen announced it on The Talk on CBS saying, “Beyoncé is not the only superstar expecting twins. Congratulations are in order for George and Amal Clooney.” In fact, he even disclosed when she is due. “Now, what we did find out that no one else is reporting is that the twins are due this June,” Julie added. 
IANS had reported that George Clooney and Amal Alamuddin got married in 2014 in a private ceremony in Venice, Italy. The two were married by Walter Veltroni, former mayor of Rome. The much-anticipated wedding, was attended by families and celebrities like Matt Damon and John Krasinski, follows a series of celebratory events leading up to Saturday’s nuptials. Clooney and Alamuddin were first spotted stepping out together in London last October and since then they had embarked on a series of globe-trotting travels, including a trip to Tanzania in March and a getaway to the Seychelles. (Also read: Karan Johar’s selfie with George Clooney is going to make a lot of ladies super jealous ) 
Lately, there were rumours of them getting a divorce. “Amal and George divorce announcement! $300 million split rocks Hollywood!” blares the latest headline of OK! Magazine, reported aceshowbiz.com earlier. “Amal wanted kids, he didn’t. She’ll get his fortune and his Lake Como villa. While they love each other, they might be realising they want different things in life,” a source said. IANS reported that the source also said the couple’s “growing divide” is allegedly due to a “long list of grievances” that have now brought the relationship “to a perilous crossroads”. But the news of Amal’s pregnancy puts that to rest we hope.
